suncertify.sockets
Class RecordSocketClient

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.sockets.RecordSocketClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBAccess
public class RecordSocketClient
extends Object
implements DBAccess

Class RecordSocketClient implements DBAccess interface. This class purposed to operate database remotely.
Each of DBAccess implemented methods:

  1. Sends RequestCommand object to the server
  2. Receives ResponseResult object from server for each of the commands SocketCommand.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Petr Shilkin

RecordSocketClient

public RecordSocketClient(String hostname,
                          int portNumber)
                   throws UnknownHostException,
                          IOException
Constructor takes in a hostname or IP address of the server to connect.

Parameters:
hostname - hostname to connect to
portNumber - number of port to connect to server
Throws:
UnknownHostException - if unable to connect to server
IOException - on network error
Method Detail

createRecord

public long createRecord(String[] data)
                  throws DuplicateKeyException
Creates a new record in the database (possibly reusing a deleted entry). Inserts the given data, and returns the record number of the new record.
Performs remote request to the server by sending SocketCommand.ADD as a socket command.

Specified by:
createRecord in interface DBAccess
Parameters:
data - values for fields of new record
Returns:
record number of newly created record
Throws:
DuplicateKeyException - record number is already in use

deleteRecord

public void deleteRecord(long recNo,
                         long lockCookie)
                  throws RecordNotFoundException,
                         SecurityException
Deletes a record, making the record number and associated disk storage available for reuse. Throws SecurityException if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.
Performs remote request to the server by sending SocketCommand.DELETE as a socket command.

Specified by:
deleteRecord in interface DBAccess
Parameters:
recNo - number of record
lockCookie - locking descriptor
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - record with specified number recNo not found
SecurityException - invalid locking descriptor lockCookie

findByCriteria

public long[] findByCriteria(String[] criteria)
Returns an array of record numbers that match the specified criteria. Field n in the database file is described by criteria[n]. A null value in criteria[n] matches any field value. A non-null value in criteria[n] matches any field value that begins with criteria[n]. (For example, "Fred" matches "Fred" or "Freddy".)
Performs remote request to the server by sending SocketCommand.FIND as a socket command.

Specified by:
findByCriteria in interface DBAccess
Parameters:
criteria - criteria to search records
Returns:
numbers of records matching criteria

lockRecord

public long lockRecord(long recNo)
                throws RecordNotFoundException
Locks a record so that it can only be updated or deleted by this client. Returned value is a cookie that must be used when the record is unlocked, updated, or deleted. If the specified record is already locked by a different client, the current thread gives up the CPU and consumes no CPU cycles until the record is unlocked.
Performs remote request to the server by sending SocketCommand.LOCK as socket command.

Specified by:
lockRecord in interface DBAccess
Parameters:
recNo - number of record
Returns:
value of locking descriptor
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - record with specified number recNo not found

readRecord

public String[] readRecord(long recNo)
                    throws RecordNotFoundException
Reads a record from the file. Returns an array where each element is a record value.
Performs remote request to the server by sending SocketCommand.READ as a socket command.

Specified by:
readRecord in interface DBAccess
Parameters:
recNo - number of record in database file
Returns:
String[] values of record with number recNo
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - record with specified number recNo not found

unlock

public void unlock(long recNo,
                   long cookie)
            throws SecurityException
Releases the lock on a record. Cookie must be the cookie returned when the record was locked; otherwise throws SecurityException.
Performs remote request to the server by sending SocketCommand.UNLOCK as a socket command.

Specified by:
unlock in interface DBAccess
Parameters:
recNo - record number
cookie - locking descriptor
Throws:
SecurityException - invalid locking descriptor cookie

updateRecord

public void updateRecord(long recNo,
                         String[] data,
                         long lockCookie)
                  throws RecordNotFoundException,
                         SecurityException
Modifies the fields of a record. The new value for field n appears in data[n]. Throws SecurityException if the record is locked with a cookie other than lockCookie.
Performs remote request to the server by sending SocketCommand.MODIFY as a socket command.

Specified by:
updateRecord in interface DBAccess
Parameters:
recNo - number of record
data - values for fields of record
lockCookie - locking descriptor
Throws:
RecordNotFoundException - record with specified number recNo not found
SecurityException - invalid locking descriptor lockCookie
